response.explain: The previous action code successfully moved the robot to the bottom cabinet. The next step is to open the bottom cabinet to access the chicken and steak inside.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge.
(2) Open the fridge.
(3) Move the robot to the bottom cabinet.
(4) Open the bottom cabinet.
(5) Grasp the chicken.
(6) Move the robot to the fridge.
(7) Put the chicken inside the fridge.
(8) Move the robot to the bottom cabinet.
(9) Grasp the steak.
(10) Move the robot to the fridge.
(11) Put the steak inside the fridge.
(12) Close the fridge.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 4: Open the bottom cabinet
    bottom_cabinet = registry(env, "bottom_cabinet_no_top_qohxjq_0")
    open(robot, bottom_cabinet)
    donothing(env)
